column1: #Text=You make sound like a bad thing that we allowed there refugees into Canada.
#Text=In the mid 1950's my family migrated from the east coast at a time when my parents could not raise their family of six.
#Text=We lived in a three room basement apartment for three years.
#Text=MY two sister's did not arrive for many months after we got to Toronto.
#Text=There was no money to pay the train fare.
#Text=But we were eventually all able to live under one roof in our three bedroom apt.
#Text=My father could not read nor write but he worked very hard and managed to land a unionized job.
#Text=After 3 years we were able to purchase a small house in East York.
#Text=WE all went to school and got an education with one of us graduating from university.
#Text=I truly feel for these refugees and hope we can bring more to Canada.
#Text=Remember in the words of John F.
#Text=Kennedy '.....ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country....'
